title: Drawing, "Textile design: Balls on patterned ground", 20th century
medium: Brush and gouache on white paper.
description: Blue and white balls with double-lined borders, scattered on blue ground decorated with white "T" motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile design: Balls on patterned ground", 20th century.
20th century. Brush and gouache on white paper.. Gift of Max Wilner. 1942-87-13-a.
